question: 枯らす
sourceMnemonic: You already learned the word <ja>枯れる</ja> which means "to wither," but this is when you are the one making a plant wither. It means <vocabulary>to let dry</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to kill</vocabulary> your plants. They didn't just die on their own, you did it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You already learned this reading when you learned <ja>枯れる</ja>, so you should be able to read this word as well.
